scenes.text:
Welcome to the Bioscience Society!

Our aim as a society is to give Bioscience Students a place where they can socialise with each other outside of lectures, as well as providing learning opportunities outside lectures and labs and academic support in terms of revision sessions.
Specific date and times for socials can be found on our SU page and our Instagram page.

Membership is only Â£3 so make sure to join regardless of your course, everyone is welcome! 

Benefits of being a member: 
- Buy tickets for events
- Get discounts/offers on Hoodies/Crewnecks exclusive to members
- Attend workshops and talks
- Take part in revision sessions

This year we have planned and organised lots of exciting events including bar crawls, film nights, non-alcoholic events, more academic support such as talks from different areas of Biosciences and revision sessions and the classic Bioscience Balls!
